qas.question: What comedy production did Spectre actors appear in?
On what TV station did Red Nose Day appear?
In what month was the preview of Spectre released in movie theaters?
When was the first teaser trailer of Spectre released?
What show did several members of the cast and crew appear on in March 2015?
Who wrote the comedy sketch for the cast and crew?

answers.text: David Walliams and the Dawson Brothers

qas.question: Several members of the cast appeared on BBC Two on what date?

plausible_answers.text: several members of the cast and crew

qas.question: Who filmed a behind-the scenes documentary of the filming of Spectre?
Which teaser trailer for Spectre was released in February 2015?
Who produced the sketch for BBC One?

context: On <b6_0>13 <a3_0>March 2015<b6_0/><a3_0/>, <b7_0>several members of the cast and crew<b7_0/>, including Craig, Whishaw, Wilson and Mendes, as well as previous James Bond actor, Sir Roger Moore, appeared in a sketch written by <a5_0><b9_0>David Walliams<b9_0/> and the Dawson Brothers<a5_0/> for <a0_0><a4_0>Comic Relief's Red Nose Day<a4_0/><a0_0/> on <a1_0>BBC One<a1_0/>. In the sketch, they film a behind-the-scenes mockumentary on the filming of Spectre. The <b8_0>first<b8_0/> teaser trailer for Spectre was released worldwide in March 2015, followed by the theatrical trailer in <a2_0>July<a2_0/> and the final trailer in October.
